title: Visiting Assistant Professor Interview
Interview Descriptions: Teaching Demo Interviewing for 9 hrs with different sets of professors and staff. They were nice and open. campus visit it all done in one day. I was a finalist

title: Manager Interview
Interview Descriptions: Standard interview process; Initial phone call followed a few weeks later by a 4 hour+ Skype interview with various team members and departments; Hiring manager was very communicative about timeline and where they were in the decision making process
Interview Questions: Describe a project you led from start to finish.

title: Peer Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions:
I had two interviewers going over my resume and cover letter. Most questions were generic, like 'why are you interested in this position'. There were no curveballs. 
The interview took place over Zoom. It was overall very informal and casual.
Interview Questions:
Why are you interested in this position?
Describe a time when you demonstrated leadership.

title: Lifeguard Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Carleton College
Interview Descriptions: Submitted a form when I first got into the school and was asked to choose which jobs I preferred to work. Selected lifeguard and got the job. They do ask for your certification.

title: Annual Fund Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Carleton College
Interview Descriptions: I applied for a position with the annual giving team.  I received a timely response back (about a week) to schedule a phone interview. The phone interview was with the director of the team . It went well, but the rapport wasn't instant - the conversation was very transnational with  the director asking me questions / me answering. Very formal and not a lot of pleasantries or anything. In the end, I was told I'd hear something within a month, and then never heard from anyone again. ,
Interview Questions: Pretty basic questions about experience, interest in the role.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: I emailed the guy who was in charge of this job and I was able to get it. They didn't even interview me. Just send an email and follow up and you should get what you want.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job?

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in Apr 2015
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed with two advisors. The interview was not hard. Interviewers were very supportive and answered all questions that I had. It was more like a conversation about what to expect and how to achieve the goals that I shared about this position.
Interview Questions: Why would you want to work at this position?

title: Graphic Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Carleton College in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: Took like, half an hour. Manager made a gut decision and hired me right away. They were interested in creating a job that suited me well and I was really encouraged by their attitude.
Interview Questions: Do you have experience in the Adobe Creative suite?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Interview Descriptions: General questions, but fairly easy going.

title: Admissions Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in May 2013
Interview Descriptions: There were multiple group interviews with various people of the team, and solo interviews with folks higher up in the office. They were very friendly and the interview was relatively casual. I really appreciated that they included lots of support staff, who you would work with closely on a daily basis.
Interview Questions: What was your college application process like?

title: Peer Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Carleton College
Interview Descriptions: After filling out an application, I was interview by three different panels, including other peer leaders and college administrators.
Interview Questions: How would I handle enforcing a policy I do not agree with?

title: Greenhouse Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions: Sitting down with Randy to review resume, go over the general greenhouse work, projects, and procedures. Talk about your personal background with Randy and learn about his - if you are a science major, what field and why; if you are a non-science major, then what is your interest in the greenhouse.
Interview Questions: Are there any projects / is there any research in particular you would like to conduct as part of your job in the greenhouse?

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Carleton College (Northfield, MN) in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: Several hoops to jump through.  Interview with staff, with the director, with students, dean, and selection committee, plus a presentation...makes for a long day with the same questions over and over.  Overkill, really.
